title: Mayura Raagam Diamond Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: Freshwater Pearls (ముత్యాలు). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricate peacock (Mayura) design meticulously crafted in Nakshi work (నక్షి పని). The Haaram features a central pendant with a ruby cabochon, surrounded by layers of diamond-studded peacock motifs. The Jhumka earrings echo the peacock theme with a matching design. The pendant is adorned with cascading freshwater pearls, adding a touch of traditional elegance. Features a modern U style
occasions: and other grand traditional celebrations. Also suitable for high-profile events and festive gatherings.
description: A masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern sensibilities. The Mayura Raagam Haaram symbolizes beauty, grace, and prosperity. The exceptional diamond quality and the unique Hyderabadi polish guarantee enduring brilliance. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
